title: WTB: Tri-Fold Panoramic Postcard of Major league Team
author: wacturner

posts.post_title: WTB: Tri-Fold Panoramic Postcard of Major league Team
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone I am looking for an example of a tri-fold postcard of a major league team.  If anyone has one for sale please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks for your time 

William
I would recommend the Pirates one from 1909 (I believe) which has Honus Wagner on it.  Will send you a scan.

He might mean something like this. This one has a lower left crease and is unfolded. I don't have any for sale, and only have 2-3  tri-folds anyway. Good luck in the quest. Wags is 3rd from the end on the right.  Triple folds are cool.

Nice scan Leon. That is awesome.

William
